info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 9:53AM MST until February 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Thursday. Greatest impacts are expected tonight and Tuesday morning, and again Tuesday night through Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become extremely hazardous due to near whiteout conditions in periods of heavy snow and blowing snow. Plan on icy and snowpacked roadways and significant drifting snow. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
